abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel calls for revision of how city funds teacher pensions in light of $200 million in budget cuts for public schools and plans to eliminate 1,400 jobs.
lead_paragraph: Amid deep cuts in school budgets and jobs, Mayor Rahm Emanuel said teacher pensions need to be funded differently.

headline.main: A Call to Revise How Chicago Funds Teacher Pensions
headline.print_headline: A Call to Revise How Chicago Funds Pensions

snippet: Amid deep cuts in school budgets and jobs, Mayor Rahm Emanuel said teacher pensions need to be funded differently.
